confirmedLocations.description: NVIDIA BVI Holdings Limited, Taiwan Branch

confirmedLocations.line2: Plot # 6A&B, IT Park Layout, RR District

name: NVIDIA
description: Since its founding in 1993, NVIDIA (NASDAQ: NVDA) has been a pioneer in accelerated computing. The company’s invention of the GPU in 1999 sparked the growth of the PC gaming market, redefined computer graphics, ignited the era of modern AI and is fueling the creation of the metaverse. NVIDIA is now a full-stack computing company with data-center-scale offerings that are reshaping industry.

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:42447607.description: La invención de la GPU por parte de NVIDIA en 1999 provocó el crecimiento del mercado de juegos de PC, redefinió los modernos gráficos de computadora y revolucionó la computación paralela. Más recientemente, el aprendizaje profundo de GPU encendió la inteligencia artificial moderna, la próxima era de la informática, con la GPU actuando como el cerebro de las computadoras, los robots y los automóviles autónomos que pueden percibir y comprender el mundo. Hoy, NVIDIA es cada vez más conocida como "la compañía de computación de IA".
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:42447607.name: NVIDIA Latinoamérica

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:3761136.description: NVIDIA’s Design and Visualization platform gives artists, designers, engineers and developers the power to realize their vision. From innovative product development to immersive story-telling to reimagining the cities of the future, NVIDIA works with you to do it better and faster.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:3761136.name: NVIDIA Design and Visualization

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:18094797.description: NVIDIA is driving innovation in autonomous vehicles. Follow us for news and inspiration.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:18094797.name: NVIDIA DRIVE

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:3970082.description:
The conference for the era of AI.

GTC is where developers, researchers, business leaders, creators, IT decision-makers, and students gather to learn how to shape our world with the power of AI, computer graphics, data science, and more. Come explore the latest technology and business trends and learn from experts on how AI is profoundly impacting industries and society as a whole.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:3970082.name: NVIDIA GTC

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:71986325.description: NVIDIA Omniverse™ is a platform of APIs, SDKs, and services that enable developers to easily integrate Universal Scene Description (OpenUSD) and NVIDIA RTX™ rendering technologies into existing software tools and simulation workflows for building AI systems.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:71986325.name: NVIDIA Omniverse

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:100932021.description:
1993년 창립 이래 NVIDIA는 가속 컴퓨팅 분야를 선도하고 있습니다. 1999년에 GPU를 발명하여 PC 게임 시장의 성장을 촉발하고, 컴퓨터 그래픽을 재정의했으며, 최신 AI 시대를 열고, 시장 전반에 걸쳐 산업의 디지털화를 촉진하고 있습니다. NVIDIA는 현재, 업계를 재편하고 있는 데이터센터 규모의 제품을 갖춘 풀스택 컴퓨팅 기업으로 성장하였습니다.

AI 컴퓨팅 기업으로서 NVIDIA는 분야 최고의 인재를 모집하고 그들의 창의성을 통해 산업을 발전시키고 있습니다.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:100932021.name: NVIDIA Korea

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:103331527.description:
Explore and engage with the NVIDIA Inception startup ecosystem, a program that has supported 20,000+ startups.

The NVIDIA Inception Program is designed to help startups accelerate innovation and growth. Program members get access to the latest developer resources and training, exclusive NVIDIA hardware and software pricing, and exposure to the venture capital community. The program is free and available to tech startups of all stages.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:103331527.name: NVIDIA for Startups

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:18000973.description: News and information about GPU-accelerated data centers for high performance computing (HPC), supercomputing, AI, deep learning, IT, and AI-accelerated analytics.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:18000973.name: NVIDIA Data Center

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:3589800.description: NVIDIA virtual GPU solutions deliver visually demanding applications from either on-premise or cloud-based virtualized servers.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:3589800.name: NVIDIA Virtual GPU

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:40981439.description: A invenção da GPU da NVIDIA em 1999 provocou o crescimento do mercado de jogos para PC, redefiniu os gráficos de computador modernos e revolucionou a computação paralela. Mais recentemente, o deep learning com GPU acendeu a AI moderna - a próxima era da computação - com a GPU atuando como o cérebro de computadores, robôs e veículos autônomos que podem perceber e entender o mundo. Hoje, a NVIDIA é cada vez mais conhecida como "a empresa de computação de AI".
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:40981439.name: NVIDIA Brasil

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:6629126.description: Stay up to date with NVIDIA’s upcoming campus events, internship and new college graduate opportunities, as well as the latest buzz!
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:6629126.name: NVIDIA University Recruiting

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:18000077.description: Preventing disease. Building smart cities. Revolutionizing analytics. These are just a few things happening today where AI initiatives are creating real results for businesses.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:18000077.name: NVIDIA AI

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:90460745.description: Helping physicians, researchers, and innovators harness the power of AI and HPC to do their life's work.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:90460745.name: NVIDIA Healthcare

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:68992010.description: Data center networking is essential in confronting the challenges of modern-day computing. NVIDIA networking delivers accelerated software-defined networking, storage, security, and management services that are turning the data center into one compute unit.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:68992010.name: NVIDIA Networking

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:79124990.description: NVIDIA’s invention of the GPU sparked the PC gaming market and went on to reshape trillion-dollar industries and fuel the growth of many others. Today, gaming is the world’s largest entertainment industry. With more than 200 million gamers, NVIDIA GeForce® is its largest platform. GeForce RTX GPUs, GeForce Experience™ application, and the popular GeForce NOW online gaming service transform everyday PCs into powerful gaming machines. Our invention of RTX graphics technology has reinvented graphics and is a powerful tool for game developers to shatter the status quo.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:79124990.name: NVIDIA Game Developer

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:37553728.description: Official NVIDIA handle for all things Robotics and Edge AI.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:37553728.name: NVIDIA Robotics
